author: Blazer
text: Probably one of the most smooth experiences I have ever had playing hitman. I have had no disconnects while playing. (except the ones that happen because of bugs but I have heard those are gone now) There aren't any real downsides to switching. Custom contracts, escalations, and missions are all there. Only bad thing I can think of is not having all of the escalations, but those will be added eventually.

author: apgl07
text: Peacock is very nice and I am not being forced to say this

author: Krugermeiier
text: I love peacock because ioi servers suck
